# AUDIO::SET_PED_FOOTSTEPS_EVENTS_ENABLED

## Summary
Set footstep events enabled on a given ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** enabed

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enables/disables ped's "loud" footstep sound.
